cc.mallet.grmm.types

类 BoltzmannUnaryFactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.mallet.grmm.types.AbstractTableFactor
      • cc.mallet.grmm.types.TableFactor
        • cc.mallet.grmm.types.BoltzmannUnaryFactor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DiscreteFactor, Factor, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class BoltzmannUnaryFactor
extends TableFactor
    A factor over a continuous variable theta and binary variables var. such that phi(x|theta) is Potts. That is, for fixed theta, phi(x) = 1 if all x are equal, and exp^{-theta} otherwise. $Id: BoltzmannUnaryFactor.java,v 1.1 2007/10/22 21:37:44 mccallum Exp $
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
